titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation we have received undoubted advice, that a great and sudden invasion from Holland, with an armed force of foreigners, will be speedily be made in a hostile manner upon this our kingdom ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
James II, King of England, 1633-1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill, Henry Hills, and Thomas Newcomb ...,

notesStmt.note: Other title information from head of title.
"Given at our court at VVhitehall, the 28th day of September, 1688. In the fourth year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
